privacyRequestsConfiguration.description: The configuration link in the Privacy Requests sidebar where a user can configure a messaging provider and storage.

organizationManagement.description: Management page to configure Organization details for RoPA reporting, messaging, etc.

standaloneConnections.description: Allow the creation of standalone connections for testing

assetConsentStatusLabels.description: Consent status labels for assets discovered by the web monitor

downloadAccessRequestResults.description: Download access data from completed requests

alphaManualTaskConditions.description: Enables UI to specify conditions for manual task creation

newIntegrationManagement.description: Shows all integrations (including SaaS) in the integrations page
